name: Bottle Gourd Curry
description: Bottle Gourd Curry (calabash). Light, tomatoey and healthy. This delicious curry is full of flavor and goodness. Vegan Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1  Serrano chili pepper finely chopped ((put half if you want it less spicy))
3-4 cups Lauki/Doodhi/Bottle gourd ((peeled and chopped into half inch cubes))

recipeInstructions.text: I cook this curry in a pressure cooker, but you can use a covered pan as well.
recipeInstructions.name: I cook this curry in a pressure cooker, but you can use a covered pan as well.

recipeInstructions.text: In the cooker/pan, heat the oil on medium heat
recipeInstructions.name: In the cooker/pan, heat the oil on medium heat

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the asofetida(hing powder) and mustard seeds and wait till they start to splutter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the asofetida(hing powder) and mustard seeds and wait till they start to splutter.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cumin seeds and coriander powder and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cumin seeds and coriander powder and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped chili peppers and garlic and mix well. Cook until garlic is slightly golden
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped chili peppers and garlic and mix well. Cook until garlic is slightly golden

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the ginger and curry leaves and mix for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the ginger and curry leaves and mix for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the tomatoes and salt and let cook for 5-7 minutes until the tomatoes are tender and they pick up the garlicky flavor. you will be able to smell the tomato garlic aroma.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the tomatoes and salt and let cook for 5-7 minutes until the tomatoes are tender and they pick up the garlicky flavor. you will be able to smell the tomato garlic aroma.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped bottle gourd and mix well. Pressure cook for 2 whistles and switch off.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped bottle gourd and mix well. Pressure cook for 2 whistles and switch off.

recipeInstructions.text: If cooking in a pan, add in some water with the bottle gourd and cook on medium heat covered until the bottle gourd is soft and easily smashed.
recipeInstructions.name: If cooking in a pan, add in some water with the bottle gourd and cook on medium heat covered until the bottle gourd is soft and easily smashed.

recipeInstructions.text: Adjust for salt and spice(chili powder optional) and garnish with cilantro. Serve hot with rotis/ chapatis/Naan or basmati rice!
recipeInstructions.name: Adjust for salt and spice(chili powder optional) and garnish with cilantro. Serve hot with rotis/ chapatis/Naan or basmati rice!
